description: As a user, I can compare a Lexus trim to other vehicle trims
name: Compare Vehicles

elements.name: User can successfully compare one vehicle to another

steps.name: user starts Compare flow on a large viewport
they select the ls model
they select the LS 460 trim
they add a competitor trim
The user will be navigated to Compare Report Page

description: As a user, I can locate a Lexus Dealer
name: Locate a Dealer

elements.name: The first time a user visits the locator on tablet they get the first time experience

steps.name: user goes to the dealer landing page
they viewing on a tablet size
the fullscreen experience is displayed
searching 11221 returns at least one result
user selects dealer info
user reviews dealer info
user navigates to complete Contact Dealer form

cells: This is a car test report

elements.name: The first time a user visits the locator on desktop they get the first time experience

steps.name: user goes to the dealer landing page
they viewing on a desktop size
the fullscreen experience is displayed
searching 90016 returns at least one result
user selects dealer info
user reviews dealer info
user navigates to complete Contact Dealer form

cells: This is a car test report

elements.name: The first time a user visits the locator on mobile they get the first time experience

steps.name: user goes to the dealer landing page
they viewing on a mobile size
the fullscreen experience is displayed
searching 90018 returns at least one result
user selects dealer info
User reviews dealer info on mobile
user selects visit Website on Mobile

elements.name: Able to find dealers in the given zipcode

steps.name: User enters a zipcode  on find a dealer page
Lexus dealers for that zipcode are displayed

name: Test to check if all Important features are passing

elements.name: Tiles are present at page load

steps.name: Homepage is loaded
Ensure there are tiles

elements.name: Able to navigate between different tabs on the secondary navigation.

steps.name: User is on Model page
User should be able to click through items in the secondary navigation menu
Navigate to the correct section on the same Model Page

elements.name: Able to navigate between different tabs on the Tertiary navigation.

steps.name: User is on Model page
User Clicks on the features tab in the secondary nav
Tertiary nav is displayed successfully with links to feature oriented sections of the page

elements.name: Close the image overlay successfully by using close button

steps.name: User is on gallery page
Image overlay is displayed
User clicks the close button
Overlay is closed on the gallery page

elements.name: Disclaimers exist in global navigation

steps.name: User is on home page
Verify asterisk is displayed in global nav
Clicking on Asterisk opens a disclaimer
Verify disclaimer text is displayed
Close the disclaimer
Ensure tool tip is closed

name: Test to check if all pages loads successfully

elements.name: Hero Takeover is steady across all view ports on Desktop

steps.name: User is on home page
Ensure the Hero image is displayed properly on Desktop  view
Ensure Header is displayed properly in Desktop mode
Ensure Footer is displayed properly in Desktop mode

elements.name: Hero Takeover is steady across all view ports on Tablet

steps.name: User is on home page

steps.name: User is on home page

Ensure Header is displayed properly in Mobile mode
Ensure Footer is displayed properly in Mobile mode
